definition: to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely

sentences.english: It is against nature for the parents to kill their babies.
sentences.chinese: 父母親殺嬰是違反人性的。

sentences.english: Would life in the tundra justify infanticide?
sentences.chinese: 苔原地帶的艱苦生活能作爲殺嬰行爲的藉口嗎？
